ModMetaData.name: [MIS] - Framework
ModMetaData.author: M.I.S. Group
ModMetaData.description:
蘑菇墨鱼串串香制作组的功能性Mod 主要功能: 招募系统 - 直接招募一名指定属性,装备,故事,人际关系等的殖民者(干员) 文档系统 - 会记录干员的技能成长,死亡后再次招募会是成长后的属性 立绘显示 - 在点击干员后会显示干员的立绘(二次元浓度上升了) 语音播放 - 在招募,选择,征召干员和干员死亡时可以播放语音 技能系统 - 当前主要为明日方舟干员定制
几乎所有功能都有xml接口. 若你希望定制自己的角色并于游戏中招募,可使用本mod轻松实现.不需要任何C#知识.
Functional framework by Mushroom and Inkfish Sticked Barbecue Group. Main Features: Recruiting System(Directly recruit a operator with full set of fixed almost every stats: apparels, traits, stories, etc.) Stats Documentation System for recruited operators Display portrait of operators Play a segment of voice when recruiting, selecting and drafting an operator Skill System(Currently mainly for arknights operators)
Most featrures provided xml API for other modders to design own characters. Creating a new full functional character without usage of C# is possible with this frame.
